Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.surfaces.java2d

Class Java2dDrawingSurface

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry.DrawingCoordinateSystem
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.surfaces.java2d.Java2dDrawingSurface
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.Named, Coordinated, CoordinateSystem, DrawingSurface
public class Java2dDrawingSurface extends DrawingCoordinateSystem implements DrawingSurface
A Java2D DrawingSurface with x, y coordinates in a DrawingCoordinateSystem. The drawing area on the Graphics2D surface is bounded by a DrawingRectangle, with an origin in the top left, but not necessarily at 0, 0. A Java2dDrawingSurface can be created for a Graphics2D surface and drawing area on that surface with surface(String, Graphics2D, DrawingRectangle).
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    • drawText

      public void drawText​(Style style, DrawingPoint at, String text)
      Draws the given text, in the given style, at the given DrawingPoint. Because determining text shape is expensive, this method has no return value. To get the shape of drawn text, call DrawingSurface.textShape(Style, DrawingPoint, String)
      Specified by:
